summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the inside temperature (up 1.6°C), cooler for the outside temperature (down 8.6°C) and feels like temperature (down 8.1°C), and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 177 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and winds should remain light. Showers, fog or low cloud is expected, and it’s dark. Little change in the weather.
